content:
Imagine system A sends Create Task to system B. Later, system A wants to correct or update information in the task - perhaps change the description, the type of task, the author, the date/times, or the inputs. Should this be allowed?

What if the Task has already progressed into the Accepted or In-Progress state?

@Lloyd McKenzie @Vassil Peytchev @Debi Willis @Natasha Kreisle
